meta.description: Optimize the shipment of burger patties using trucks and vans to minimize the total number of trips.

sets.name: VEHICLES
sets.description: Types of vehicles used for shipment

params.name: capacity
params.description: Capacity of each vehicle type in patties

params.name: cost
params.description: Cost per trip for each vehicle type

vars.name: trips
vars.description: Number of trips for each vehicle type

objective.name: min_total_trips
objective.description: Minimize the total number of trips

constraints.name: patties_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 50000 patties are shipped

constraints.name: budget_constraint
constraints.description: Ensure the total cost does not exceed the budget of $12500

constraints.name: truck_van_ratio
constraints.description: The number of trucks must not exceed the number of vans
